snippet: Back-and-forth donations from a sliver of ordinary voters mirror the undulations of the swing electorate.
abstract: Tiny sliver of swing voters are wavering in their donations between Pres Obama and Mitt Romney, mirroring undulations of swing electorate; some have settled on a candidate but other undecided donors say they do not have their hearts set on a particular outcome.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and JO CRAVEN McGINTY

lead_paragraph: Back-and-forth donations from a sliver of ordinary voters mirror the undulations of the swing electorate.

headline.seo: Some Voters Waver Even in Their Political Donations
headline.main: Some Voters Are Spelling Out Their Indecision on Their Donation Checks
headline.print_headline: Some Voters Are Spelling Out Their Indecision on Their Donation Checks
